name: Kamen Rider Black: Taiketsu Shadow Moon
summary: Kamen Rider Black must defeat the mutants of the Gorgom cult and Shadow Moon - the brainwashed twin of Kamen Rider Black in exciting all in one-on-one boss battles! Kamen Rider Black takes on his enemies not only on foot, but also with his Battle Hopper over obstacles before reaching the next boss battle.

alternative_names.name: Kamen Rider Black: Taiketsu Shadow Moon
